timeline.message:
Update dependencies / Fix warnings

- Bouncy Castle 1.65 -> 1.65.01
- Dropwizard 2.0.9 -> 2.0.10
- Jetty 9.4.29 -> 9.4.30
- Reactor 3.3.5 -> 3.3.6
- Spring Boot 2.3.0 -> 2.3.1, 2.1.14 -> 2.1.15
- Tomcat 9.0.35 -> 9.0.36, 8.5.55 -> 8.5.56
- Examples:
  - Dagger 2.27 -> 2.28
  - grpc-kotlin-stub 0.1.2 -> 0.1.3
- Build:
  - Gradle 6.4.1 -> 6.5
  - Checkstyle 8.32 -> 8.33
  - eureka-client 1.9.22 -> 1.9.23
  - gax-grpc 1.56.0 -> 1.57.0
  - json-unit 2.17.0 -> 2.18.0
  - Shadow 5.2.0 -> 6.0.0
- Fix warnings
  - Add `SupportedSourceVersion` annotation to `DocumentationProcessor`
  - Fix various deprecated API usages
